name: Funky Citizens
membership:
Part of the TransparenCEE network - https://transparencee.org/
Participation to the activities of the International Fact-checking Network - https://www.poynter.org/channels/fact-checking
goal: Funky Citizens is a Romanian NGO that builds research-based, data-driven online advocacy tools that aim to be educational and actionable, encouraging citizens to engage in good governance initiatives in which they can see an impact.  Our data-driven online platforms proved their sustainability in time (with hundreds of thousands of visitors during their existence); an online and offline community of mainly young and dynamic citizens joining us in our efforts to promote good governance (we make a lot of use of our over 70.000 Facebook likes on all our platforms). We have formal or informal partnerships/ collaborations with organizations like Code for Romania, RISE Project as well as with more general media platforms (i.e. Republica.ro, Sapte Seri).
interests: Budget, Communication, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Home Affairs, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
- anticorruption and money laundering
- open government/ open data
- good governance
- public spending and public procurement
- digital agenda
- public participation and youth empowerement
- fact-checking and fighting fake news
